## Deployment

Deploy the iSEE shiny application to the shinyapps.io by RStudio server:

```{r}
library(rsconnect)
options(repos = BiocManager::repositories())
rsconnect::deployApp("shiny", appName = "heart", appTitle = "Heart", account = "jashmore")
```
